metadata.name: A New Beginning
metadata.description:
As the breeze rustles the Sakura trees, the delicate petals flutter with ease, a sight so breathtaking and serene, a moment that's cherished and often seen.

A new beginning, fresh and bright, a canvas to paint, a life to sow.

A New Beginning -
1903 x 2734 px


This is the first work after I finished the Everyday Girls collection on OpenSea. A new beginning, a new collection which come at the right time with Spring season in Japan.

The first buyer will be granted the acrylic stand version of this work as a bonus, sent physically to your home.
